name: Woodcutter (Husaria Games)
description:
DEMO IS ON END OF SITE!

Woodcutter is a classic platformer, tells the story of Woodcutter.

The game is under development, you can download the demo completely for free, and donations are welcome (they will help finish the game by purchasing assets, software, etc.). But if you deposit 5€ you will get the game when finished (the game will not be abandoned! - you also have a money back guarantee if I fail to fulfill the contract [applies only to the above amounts].). 

Download the game demo for free and judge if it's worth supporting me. 

If you would like to support me with any amount, please visit the second full game page, where you can make a donation:

https://husaria-games.itch.io/invaders

or there

https://wspieram.to/woodcutter

And if you want to take advantage of the 5€ discount, use the PRE-ORDER on this site.

In DEMO you have three levels to play.

In PRE-ORDER there are more of them (now 20 and 1 boss level).

Ultimately, there will be over 50 of them with different biomes and a lot of different enemies. For those who order the pre-order, the game will be gradually updated until the final version and then enriched with new things in updates.

Very long product support is planned!

This is not the final look of the game, it will be improved with various things, mechanics and visuals.

Have a nice game...

CONTROLS:

Arrows: Movement

Z: Jump/Double jump/Scrolling text

Hold Z: High jump

X: Shoot

SHIFT: Interaction with the environment

R: Restart level

Enter: Pause

MINIMAL REQUIREMENTS:

64-bit system

Integrated graphics and music

Intel Celeron DualCore  1.10GHz

4GB RAM

UPDATES:

Everything is described in the DEVLOG. Only the latest update is described here.

BETA VERSION v1.5.0.0

-Minor bugs and shortcomings have been fixed

-Graphics have been improved

-New enemies have been added

-Levels have been added

-Hidden chambers have been added
